text:
It appears President Trump & his administration have learned nothing from the Chinese government’s failure to quickly & transparently combat the coronavirus

Hiding the truth about the coronavirus and the government’s response only increases the likelihood of the virus spreading https://t.co/6yM322DeDD

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
